deployment.message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"cd93221233149af93741d938f641e6fc45668cbd","repoName":"amb-emilb/workbook-teams-bot","actor":"amb-emilb","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"Fix Teams bot authentication architecture

Replace BotFrameworkAdapter with TeamsAdapter to resolve authorization errors:
- Updated TeamsAdapter configuration with proper credential handling
- Modified Teams AI Application to accept adapter and botAppId parameters
- Fixed message processing to use adapter.process() with teamsApp.run()
- Removed unused appPassword variable and fixed ESLint issues
- Maintains existing Key Vault integration and security features

This addresses the fundamental architectural mismatch that was causing
"Authorization has been denied" errors when bot tried to send responses.

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>"}
